title: Zorba the Greek - Arena di Verona
description:
Starring	Diego Ciavatti, Rosalba Garavelli, Gheorghe 

Iancu,
Luciana Savignano, Vladimir Vassiliev
Choreographer	Lorca Massine
Composer	Mikis Theodorakis
Director	Luigi Bonori
Performer(s)	Diego Ciavatti, Rosalba Garavelli, Gheorghe 

Iancu, Pantelis Karnezis,
Sofia Mikailidou, Costas Papadopoulos, Luciana Savignano, 

Vladimir Vassiliev
Source Writer	Nikos Kazantzakis
Stage Director	Lorca Massine


Description:
Vladimir Vassiliev; Gheorghe Iancu; Luciana Savignano; 

Rosalba Garavelli; Diego Ciavatti; Sofia Mikailidou; Costas 

Papadopoulos; and Pantelis Karnezis perform with the 

Orchestra, Chorus and Corp de ballet of the Arena di 

Verona/Mikis Theodorakis live at the Arena di Verona, 

August 1990 in this Theodorakis ballet.

This stage production from 1990 actually constitutes a 

ballet adaptation of Nikos Kazantzakis's much-loved novel 

ZORBA THE GREEK, set to music by Mikis Theodorakis, who 

scored the 1964 film of ZORBA. Performed at the Arena di 

Verona in 1990, it stars Vladimir Vassiliev as the title 

character, Gheorghe Iancu as John, Luciano Savignano as 

Marina, and Rosalba Garavelli as Madame Ortense. The 

Orchestra, Chorus, and Corp de Ballet of the Arena di 

Verona perform, with Theodorakis himself conducting. This 

is the only Diego Ciavatti video. Stars also making their 

debut in this video: Rosalba Garavelli, Luciana Savignano, 

Luigi Bonori.
